"...Phew.": "What are you doing out here?"
"What are we investigating today?"
"Hm?"
"Oh, it's you."
"Hm?"
"Oh, it's you. What am I investigating?"

"I'm reviewing the condition of
the Environmental Control Units."
"Environmental Control Units?"
"Yeah, you know..."
"Oh, sorry."

"Those giant devices over there
that line the borders of every region."

"Those things apparently
manage Halpha's environments."

"Though we've always kind of
assumed that's what they did."

"But thanks to information provided by the Lecielans,
we now know more details about them."

"Apparently, there are similar devices
placed way out in the open sea."
"I haven't seen anything like that."
"So we can't go beyond the ocean?"
"Well, I doubt you would have."
"Yeah. It seems that way..."

"This whole island's environment is
being managed entirely through Leciel."

"Beyond the island, the atmospheric
composition isn't suitable for us to breathe."
"And so, we can't leave this place."

"Oh, by the way, \"island\" is the word for
the ground we're all currently standing on."

"The Lecielans have been calling it things like
\"Halpha Island\" and \"Central Island\"."
"...And, given the context, well..."

"It would seem there are many islands similar to this one
that have been developed by Resurgent ARKS."

"The majority of which were considered
unusable and were abandoned."

"Some of these experimental islands
were discovered not too long ago."

"I think they're being called
\"Creative Spaces\" or something."

"Many of those islands can be
reached by way of Ryuker Device."

"Well, assuming you have
the right destination address."
"Have you tried visiting one of those islands yet?"
"I have."
"Not yet."
"I see."

"Well if you do, I'd be interested in
any creations you make."

"If you complete any creations there,
I hope you'll let me see them."
